markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scything Blade Snare](/Equipment.aspx?ID=341)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Snare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=146" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 591 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 320 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This snare sends a powerful series of scything blades to slice through a creature entering the snare’s square, dealing 14d8 slashing damage (DC 31 basic Reflex).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Scything Blade Snare
